quest.name: Most Like It Sparkly
journal:
An entreating look is painted on Managingway's face.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Paintingway at Lovingway's Darlings.
Deliver the requested items to Paintingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Our imaging station has been awash with Ways eager to try their paws at painting.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: However, as with many of our endeavors, zealousness has overwhelmed available supply, and we find ourselves at a loss. A loss of paint, in this case.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Paintingway has just left for Lovingway's Darlings to gather the necessary supplies for more. Might you lend them your support? I haven't the heart to explain to another Way that we are currently out of Sunshine Yellow...

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4708
dialogue.text: <blip> Ready and happy to provide for you.

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: What a relief to see you, Forename. I was hoping I might ask for your help!

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: I'm currently gathering mushrooms that will make our pigments sparkle something wonderful, but if you could help prepare some other supplies for me, our paint shall be done in half the time.

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: You seem to know your way around metal, so could you grind me a glimmering powder? Our paint will blind our artists with its brilliance! ...Hopefully only metaphorically. This doing supporter should have any extra supplies you need.

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: You seem to have clever fingers, so could you make me a small agitator? And before you try a person-joke, I mean the tool─I'll need it to mix the paint. This doing supporter should have any extra supplies you need.

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: You seem to know how to mix a good concoction, so could you create me an additive to moderate hue? Sunshine Yellow is trickier than you'd think, and the Ways won't settle for Lemon anymore. This doing supporter should have any extra supplies you need.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4708
dialogue.text: <blip> Oh no! You already have enough supplies. This supporter is currently unable to provide for you...

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4708
dialogue.text: <blip> Oh no! You already have enough supplies. This supporter is currently unable to provide for you...

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4708
dialogue.text: <blip> Oh no! You already have enough supplies. This supporter is currently unable to provide for you...

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4708
dialogue.text: <blip> Huzzah! Your supply request is being processed. Please accept this supporter's allocation and eager encouragement.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4708
dialogue.text: <blip> Huzzah! Your supply request is being processed. Please accept this supporter's allocation and eager encouragement.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4708
dialogue.text: <blip> Huzzah! Your supply request is being processed. Please accept this supporter's allocation and eager encouragement.

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: Finished already?

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: Lovely! Just what the artist ordered.

dialogue.name: PAINTINGWAY
dialogue.text: I've finished up here, so I'll head back and start mixing. Thank you for your help, and do see Managingway about a reward─you've earned it!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Now, that is the look of a womanman who has made a significant contribution to the happiness of artistic Loporrits!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: The drive to create with one's own paw─be it art or destiny─is nothing but inspirational. It truly demonstrates the strength of each of our Ways.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Through the creativity you have been helping us cultivate, we are slowly awakening to our full potential. Self-congratulatory though it may sound to say, I do believe our future shines bright upon the horizon.
